modules.description: Provides functions for executing SQL queries, managing connections, and handling prepared statements with strong type checking to prevent runtime errors. Works with data types such as query results, connection pools, and parameterized SQL commands. Used to build reliable database interactions in applications requiring strict error prevention and consistent query execution.

The module offers serialization, conversion, and comparison functions for data types like Ptime's date/time structures, hstore, inet, point, and numeric values, supporting both safe (option-returning) and unsafe (exception-throwing) operations. It enables handling timezone-aware time manipulations, PostgreSQL value interoperability, and robust error management for invalid or missing data, particularly useful in applications requiring precise temporal data processing and database integration.
